sentence.text: @singh_biswajeet do u think elections will be held fairly in Punjab?
@singh_biswajeet my gut feeling is Modi will never allow AAP to win @GhatiyaDin what about voter list, are they clean?
DMK is going to support NDA in 2019, Maran let off @cpronammametro sir, when will the KR market station be completed?
@singh_biswajeet despite knowing vendetta of modi, you want to asses the performance?
@hszinda035 what is the % chances of winning?

Tell honestly @KarnatakaWorld can u name few of the best trekking spots @ramanmann1974 @RadhamohanBJP @Devinder_Sharma @seemay @DasBolshevik @timesofindia sir, this is nothing but chrony capitalism @uavasanthrao what us R 2 sir?

@ramanmann1974 this is open loot, absolutely disgusting @GSKang9 @AAPPunjab2017 @AapBaghapurana @ArvindKejriwal Good sir, please build good storage facilities when u come to power @BlrCityPolice @CPBlr @Citymarketbcp thanks sir @ramanmann1974 @Devinder_Sharma @Sridhar67 @Vidyut @DasBolshevik @sanjeebm77 I give more salary to my maid than what a farmer earns @Sandhwan how will you revive the economy sir, you have promised sixth pay as well.
From where will u generate revenue?
@jastej @Sandhwan sir, I agree with it.
But it is not enough, you have to find alternate sources for revenue generation @jastej sir, How will you handle SYL issue?
Supreme court order is against Punjab.

Modi will try to create anarchy and bring president rule @aa3132 unfortunately, of all the states, AAP karnataka is no where in picture @deepakbansal127 Do something for potato growers, farmers in bhatinda are in deep trouble.
@DGP_FIRE sir, please make sure it doesn't happen again @devmann999 how confident are u about winning?

@PMOIndia please ask Banks not to charge for minimum balance @narendramodi sir,.please ask banks not to charge for minimum balance @singh_biswajeet didn't I tell u modi will not let AAP win, you didn't believe @ashish770 absolutely, I have been saying this since loksabha election @hitesh_jain90 Bhai, don't be so innocent.
You know how EVM' s work.
@malwinder25 @arvinrags Dr Saab, you people still believe EVM's, EVM' s have been tampered massively @singh_biswajeet I told you modi will never let AAP win.
EVM are easily vulnerable machines not electronic voting machine @GhatiyaDin shut up, people voted for AAP but votes went to Congress, don't be so innocent.
Find out who manufactures EVM @devinder_ps no use, EVM's will never let BJP lose @devinder_ps bjp don't mind losing against Congress.
@pbhushan1 @msrbpl @YouTube why don't you file PIL and bring ballot paper back @chaitanya1309 hahaha, whatever you do, EVM's will not let AAP win.
@IVNTalks its an open secret, EVM's are easily vulnerable machine @BspUp2017 take this to logical conclusion.
Go to streets, take support of other parties @anshBx @Maddy_Saheb @DrSYQuraishi those were all bjp strong seats @avtar_badesha @ArvindKejriwal you people are definitely stupid.
You still don't believe that EVM can be rigged and modi is capable of doing @avtar_badesha @ArvindKejriwal how did we win with huge margin where VVPat trail was there?
@avtar_badesha @ArvindKejriwal can u explain the loss of principal baldev singh who toiled hard day and night?
@maneetpunjab5 why you people are not believing that EVM were rigged.
No way you can win whatever you do @avtar_badesha document think alkalis are fools to rigg everywhere, tell me how principal baldev singh lost?

@avtar_badesha stupid reason, don't be so innocent, akalis rigged election in 2012, this election they rigged in favour of Congress @avtar_badesha @ArvindKejriwal @BajpaiDeepak all those were there in Congress also, how did people vote them despite knowing they are corrup @RaviRajVasudev sir, EC has IAS officers who are servants of modi.
Do u think they will do anything @avtar_badesha kindly follow BSP tweet line to know the reality of EVM's.
Tell me why VVPat was not there despite supreme court order?

Election Commission of india: Bring back the ballot paper and stop using EVMs in Elections https://t.co/wI7eRrj2o3 via @ChangeOrg_India @PunjabFateh why u people are not believing that EVM was rigged ?
@yesimpooja unfortunately no media is raising this issue.

@HasanSafin don't contest elections if VVPat is not implemented in all constituencies @ArvindKejriwal Congress is also demanding paper ballot, this is the right time to raise this issue, demand for paper ballot system @devinder_ps Still you people are not ready to believe that EVM were tampered, either you people are too innocent or dumb.
Sorry @BspUp2017 Don't waste time, go to supreme court @avtar_badesha either u people are too innocent or dumb.
I can't say more.
Is Delhi team factor so great to cause such massive defeat @avtar_badesha Congress had many infights and announced candidates late, has full of corrupt candidates,how people voted them?
@BharatPolls you will have paper evidence in VVpat similar to ballot, which can be counted.
Am I right?
@quizderek sir, please raise the issue of EVM' s in Parliament.
Request for ballot papers in future elections.
@chaitanya1309 perfect @avtar_badesha If EC refuses to count paper trails, would u agree that it has tampered?

@aa3132 @ArvindKejriwal if EC don't agree to counting paper trails, then it is sure that rigging has been done @avtar_badesha if EC doesn't oblige to count paper trails, will you accept that rigging occurred?
@Komal_Indian paper ballot is fool proof.
Counting errors can happen, but that is very minute @BaldevSinghAzad sir, I am shocked at your loss in elections.
Be in touch with the people.
Try to educate the farmers about organic farming @RaisinaSeries can u answer why developed countries uses ballot paper and not EVM?
@avtar_badesha have u seen the postal ballot results?
I heard AAP is leading in majority seats.
Is it true?
@avtar_badesha I need answer not like @avtar_badesha @newslaundry did they corroborate with paper trails.
Kindly go through BSP UP tweetline once.
Even KP has spoken about it now @avtar_badesha you can get all the works done if the opposition is credible and strong.
This wouldn't have happened if opposition was SAD @avtar_badesha I have a suggestions for AAP PB mla's.
I will share it with u.
Can u communicate that to all mla's?

Send your email id @vinodkapr sir, that is the basic requirement to be a BJP follower @ambkcsingh @narendramodi @the_hindu this is exactly the reason why he joined bjp @IndiaToday yogi will make them drink gomutra Time for farmers to go on strike.
Let farmers grow only for themselves.
Only hunger can teach lesson.
@ramanmann1974 karnataka is facing serious shortage of fodder and drinking water.
Nobody is bothered.

If rains fail this year, we r finished @ramanmann1974 Time for farmers to go on strike and stop farming enmasse to teach these politicians lesson @ramanmann1974 unity is something lacking among farmers.

Every state kisan unions needs to come together and launch nation wide agitation @ramanmann1974 @mlkhattar @Devinder_Sharma @kamaaaa6 @DasBolshevi @Chahal_IYC @VAvinash very sad @avtar_badesh Punjab should stop paddy farming as water is alarmingly low.
@ramanmann1974 @PMOIndia @Vidyut @ikaveri @DasBolshevik @RaisinaSeries @kamaaaa6 @Raksha_Kumar @VAvinash this is exactly what I was saying @avtar_badesha you will never be convinced.
You are living in a world of denial.
@avtar_badesha news channels, papers have reported it and still you don't believe @avtar_badesha I have no words to convince you.
Go ask the voters in your constituency whom did they vote for and tally it with Booth counta @avtar_badesha I will tell u the real truth.
Congress also was doing this.
BJP knew it, Advani and others raised it.

@avtar_badesha even now Cong knows that bjp is doing this, but it can't raise issue because Cong has no credibility @avtar_badesha BJP don't mind Cong as opposition party but both parties will never allow third party to emerge.

@avtar_badesha you do soul searching, do all corrections, give tickets to best candidates, I can bet you still can't win @news24tvchannel how, by removing import duties and not implementing swaminathan committee report @ramanmann1974 @Devinder_Sharma @mkvenu1 @kamaaaa6 @DasBolshevik @rachitseth @ajit_ranade @FinancialXpress great news @anilmdave sir, please https://t.co/AlrMXF1z3p don't give permission to this road which will destroy western ghats @singh_biswajeet EC officers are just IAS officers, 2 commissioners are from Gujarat cadre and you expect them to be unbiased @ShekharGupta why did ECI backed off from hackathon?
@malwinder25 has things improved regarding drugs?
@ramanmann1974 really pathetic situation.
@cpronammametro sir, frequency should be every 4 min throughout the day not just in peak hours.

@cpronammametro sir, KR market station, escalator towards Victoria hospital exit is not working @cpronammametro please increase the frequency for every 4 min throught the day not just in peak hours @ramanmann1974 @PMOIndia @Devinder_Sharma @Sridhar67 @kkuruganti @GMWatch @VAvinash @sayantanbera @RURALINDIA @gopalkagarwal this is disaste @uavasanthrao why frequency of metro is 8min at 9 am in peak hours?
I got late because of metro.

Thanks for discouraging me to use metro @ramanmann1974 @Devinder_Sharma @nit_set @MonaAmbegaonkar @ShrimantSakal @jat302 @ikaveri @Sridhar67 @RURALINDIA @nistula disgusting @PMOIndia Sir,western ghats is getting destroyed by tourism, timber mafia,road widening.
Lakhs of trees are being cut.Please save ghats.
@hallagullaboy How is your sandal business affected?
@Keyur_chauhan @kapsology I agree with u.
He overreacted many times probably because of immaturity and lack of good strategic advisor @Rambabukarri1 welcome to twitter world sir.
This is Harsha Mysore #Indebted2Farmers Farmers are the backbone of the humanity.

They deserve better standard of f living @siddaramaiah please stop shishila- byrapura highway project because it cause huge destruction of western ghats @singh_biswajeet Don't worry, EVM's will rescue BJP @avtar_badesha @ArvindKejriwal @RaisinaSeries @AamAadmiParty @msisodia @hsphoolka @RoflRavish @montugarg1 @simarjeet_bains @rahiskhan77 @DineshRedbull You will never believe, only god can open your eyes.
@malwinder25 @Ghani_Bawri Drink 5 liters water, coconut water, banana stem juice, lemon water, pomegranate juice, apple cider vinegar.
If size of stone is less than 5mm , it gets flushed out @narendramodi sir, please change the income tax slabs in this budget.
Give relief to salaried persons @MamtaMehraUK @aapkaprithvi @AAPGujarat @AAPMaharashtra @KhanAmanatullah @realpreityzinta @AcharyaPramodk @msisodia @AAP_Kerala @wizkhalifa Hi, where are u located?

@MamtaMehraUK @aapkaprithvi @AAPGujarat @AAPMaharashtra @KhanAmanatullah @realpreityzinta @AcharyaPramodk @msisodia @AAP_Kerala @wizkhalifa Can u send details to drharshatr@gmail.com @ashish_nujs How authentic is this news?
@PiyushGoyal sir, please stop Mysore- Thalessary railway line.
It is going to destroy western ghats in coorg.

We are already facing severe drought in Cauvery basin due to loss of forest @MamtaMehraUK @harbhajan_singh @bhogleharsha @sanjivbhatt @SitaramYechury @SRKUniverse @iamsrk @iFaridoon @anandmahindra @TheMahiraKhan @AcharyaPramodk @pbhushan1 @arbaazSkhan @bandrainfo @SRKFC1 @dhume @SRKFCI @gaurikhan Contact me for natural treatment of cancer if you are interested.
